author: Staff Reporter
text:
An ATM centre at Boopalarayarpuram here was damaged by some miscreants in the early hours of Monday in an attempt to loot cash.

An iron rod was found nearby the damaged ATM centre, said Assistant Superintendent of Police P. Arun Sakthi Kumar. The incident occurred between 2 a.m. and 2.30 a.m. He said the police got a clue from CCTV camera installed in the ATM centre. The bank staff also inspected the centre. Cash of over Rs.5 lakh in the ATM was kept intact as attempts made by miscreants failed, sources said.

Based on a complaint lodged by J. Ranjith Kumar (28), bank agent for the ATM centre, Tuticorin north police have filed a case.
title: Robbery attempt at ATM
